summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3677 , for the improvement of 63rd Avenue Southwest, from Beach Drive to Alki Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45316 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
